Flora of Vis

Flora of Vis

Discover the island's plant life

The island of Vis boasts a rich variety of Mediterranean plant species, many endemic to the Adriatic region.

From aromatic herbs covering the hillsides to ancient olive groves that have stood for centuries, the flora of Vis tells the story of the island's history and unique microclimate.

Did You Know?

Vis is home to over 1,000 plant species, including 50 that are endemic to the Adriatic islands.
